section.p:
If you have the codeword Dead, immediately.
If not, read on.
You cling on, only your hardy toughness keeping you alive. Fortunately for you, a passing merchant ship picks you up.
The captain, a certain Avar Hordeth, from Metriciens, in Golnir, is happy to take you to Yarimura, his next port of call.

If you have the codeword Divest, immediately.
If not, read on.
After an uneventful journey, you disembark at the harbour in Yarimura. .
